region.title: A Working City at Twilight
region.observation: This feels like a busy industrial city where people work hard - there are tall smokestacks, glowing fires, and a river running through it all.
region.why_notable: The whole scene tells a story of a place that's alive with activity and energy.
region.soft_prompt: What kind of place does this remind you of? What do you think it would feel like to be there?

steps.why_this_sequence: Starting with the big picture helps them connect emotionally to the scene

region.title: Bright Orange Flames
region.observation: See those bright orange and yellow flames shooting up from the industrial buildings? They're like little campfires, but much bigger and more dramatic.
region.why_notable: These fires make the scene feel warm and alive, like the heart of the city is glowing.
region.soft_prompt: Look for the brightest, warmest spots in the picture. What do they remind you of?

steps.why_this_sequence: The flames are emotionally striking and connect to familiar experiences
steps.builds_on: These bright spots bring life to the busy industrial story we noticed

region.title: The Calm River Below
region.observation: Down below all this activity, there's a peaceful river reflecting the city lights like a mirror, with a bridge crossing over it.
region.why_notable: It's like nature providing a quiet pathway through all the busy human activity.
region.soft_prompt: Notice how different the bottom of the picture feels from the top. What's happening down there?

steps.why_this_sequence: Contrasting calm water with industrial energy creates emotional depth
steps.builds_on: This peaceful element balances all that fiery energy we just discovered

region.title: Purple Evening Sky
region.observation: The sky has this beautiful purple and pink glow, like sunset or sunrise, making even this industrial place look magical and dreamy.
region.why_notable: It shows how even the most ordinary working places can be beautiful at the right moment.
region.soft_prompt: Look at the colors in the sky. How do they make this whole scene feel different?

steps.why_this_sequence: Ending with the sky ties together the magical feeling of the whole scene
steps.builds_on: This dreamy sky brings together the fiery energy and peaceful water into one beautiful moment

welcome_text: Let's explore this fascinating scene together! Take your time and let yourself really soak in what you're seeing. There's so much happening here, and every detail has something to tell us.

final_summary.main_takeaway: This painting shows how even busy, industrial places can be beautiful and full of life - the artist found magic in an everyday working scene.
final_summary.connections: The bright fires, peaceful river, and dreamy sky all work together to tell a story about a place where people work and live, making it feel both energetic and beautiful.
final_summary.invitation_to_return: Next time you see this, you might notice even more stories hidden in the details. What else might you discover?
final_summary.reflection_question: Does this change how you might look at industrial areas in real life?

pedagogical_approach: Started with emotional connection, used familiar comparisons, built story through contrasting elements, ended with beauty and meaning

reflection_activities.title: Finding Beauty in Everyday Places
reflection_activities.prompt: Think of a place you see often that might seem ordinary or even a little ugly at first glance. What could make it beautiful if you looked closer?
reflection_activities.placeholder: Like a parking lot with interesting shadows...
reflection_activities.why_this_activity: Assesses ability to transfer the lesson about finding beauty in industrial/everyday settings to personal experience

reflection_activities.title: What Caught Your Eye Most?
reflection_activities.prompt: What was the most interesting or surprising thing you noticed about this painting? What made it stand out to you?
reflection_activities.placeholder: The bright fires made me think of...
reflection_activities.why_this_activity: Reveals observational confidence and ability to articulate personal responses to visual elements

reflection_activities.title: If You Were There
reflection_activities.prompt: Imagine you could step into this painting. What sounds might you hear? What would the air feel like? Describe what it would be like to be there.
reflection_activities.placeholder: I might hear the crackling of fires and feel...
reflection_activities.why_this_activity: Tests ability to use sensory imagination and engage emotionally with the scene beyond just visual observation

assessment.feedback: You're doing well at your current level. Keep practicing and challenging yourself with new observations.
